original: Anderzon, Clas August Fredrik, direktör, Nässjö, f. 14/2/81 i Stodkaryd, Jönköp. 1., av käH :mäst. Anders A. o. Charlotta Madsen. G. 21 m. Signe Bondeson. Barn (m. tilln. Gare) : Nils Fredrik f. 22, ekon. stud., Gbg, Britt 23, g. m. dir. J. Ljungqvist, Nässjö. — Genomg. Filip Holmqvists hand :inst. i Gbg. Kamrer v. Nässjö Brygg. A-B 03, dir. där fr. 29. Dir. f. Sävsjö Brygg, i Sävsjö o. f. Vit-hala o. Ybelstorps Brygg, i Vetlanda.
translated: Anderzon, Clas August Fredrik, director, born on February 14, 1881 in Stodkaryd, Jönköping County. Son of master carpenter Anders A. and Charlotta Madsen. Married Signe Bondeson on May 21. Children (with approximate ages): Nils Fredrik, born in 1922, studying economics in Gothenburg, and Britt, born in 1923, married to director J. Ljungqvist in Nässjö. Completed training at Filip Holmqvist's Institute in Gothenburg. Was assistant treasurer at Nässjö Bryggeri AB in 1903 and became director there in 1929. Also director of Sävsjö Bryggeri, Sävsjö and Vit-hala and Ybelstorp Bryggeri in Vetlanda.
